title: Caesar Shift
lore: The Emoliens have learned Earth's ancient Roman cipher. They shift letters to hide their wisdom about desires and possessions.
instruction: Apply Caesar shifts to decode the messages. Pay attention to shift patterns and hints within the text.

1.instruction: Apply Caesar cipher: Shift each letter 1 position forward in alphabet
1.clue: Pronoun: First person plural subject (opposite of 'they')

2.instruction: Apply Caesar cipher: Shift each letter 1 position backward in alphabet

3.instruction: Apply sequential Caesar shifts forward: 1st letter +1 ‚Üí 2nd letter +2 ‚Üí 3rd letter +3 ‚Üí 4th letter +4
3.clue: Verb: To possess or own something

4.instruction: Apply sequential Caesar shifts backward: 1st letter -1 ‚Üí 2nd letter -2 ‚Üí 3rd letter -3
4.clue: Conjunction: Logical operator connecting two elements (& symbol)

5.instruction: Complex shift: Shift letters by their alphabet position (a = 1, b =2) ‚Üí Reverse string ‚Üí Apply backward shifts by 1,2 respectively
5.clue: Preposition: Indicating location within or inside
